column5: Hi everyone. I'm new here so I hope I'm posting this in the right place. Was wondering if anyone has fished these lakes they're north of Terrace Bay. Also is there a place to put a boat in and is there a spot to set up a tent there for a couple days (not looking for a camp ground) looking to ruff it for a couple days. Looks like the Longlac Backroad will get me there, if not or if there's a better way to access these lakes I appreciate any pointers. Thanks everyone.
You might be able to hand bomb a tinny in either lake but after looking at Google maps doesn't look like there's a proper launch on either.
Not a problem Bill, Ive got my trusty 10' aluminum with my 4hp Johnson. Thanks for the reply I really appreciate it.
Terrace Bay sounds far...and they are north of that? Sorry, never heard of any of these places. That means it must be great!
Hey Rizzo went up to Terrace Bay ended up fishing the Aguasaban river for 4 nights IMG_2281.HEIC IMG_2257.HEIC
